title: Augmented Reality and Sensor-Based Expert Training Design: Application of Reflective Practice Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Learners are pre-service or in-service science teachers aiming to develop competencies in designing and operating expert training programs utilizing augmented reality and sensor technologies.

learning_goals: Learners design training scenarios for specialized domains (aircraft maintenance/medical imaging/astronaut training) by integrating augmented reality and sensor technologies.
Learners apply a reflective practice learning model to analyze training performance data and propose improvement strategies.
Learners develop a summative evaluation framework to measure educational effectiveness based on AR prototype assessment results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
